Address.college_name: Academy of Art in Banská Bystrica

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1997
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčenie) and entrance examination

Address.college_name: Academy of Fine Arts and Design in Bratislava
Address.university_name: Vysoká škola výtvarných umení v Bratislave (VŠVU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded as Academy of Fine Arts 1949
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedcenie), and entrance examination

Address.college_name: Academy of Performing Arts in Bratislava
Address.university_name: Vysoká škola múzických umení v Bratislave (VŠMU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1949 incorporating two faculties: the Faculty of Music and the Faculty of Drama. The Department of Dance was attached to the Faculty of Music. The Faculty of Drama was divided into the Faculty of Drama and Puppet Art and the Faculty of Film and Television in 1990
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedcenie), and entrance examinations

Address.college_name: Academy of the Police Force in Bratislava

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1992. Acquired present status and title 1996
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Maturitné vysvedčenie), and entrance examinations

Address.college_name: Alexander Dubcek University in Trencin
Address.university_name: Trenčianska univerzita Alexandra Dubčeka v Trenčíne (TnUAD)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1997
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčenie) and entrance examination

Address.college_name: College of International Business ISM Slovakia in Prešov
Address.university_name: Vysoká škola medzinárodného podnikania ISM Slovakia v Prešove

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2005

Address.college_name: College of Management in Trenčíne

GeneralInformation.History: Founded in 1999 by the City University of Seattle
AdmissionRequirements: High School or GED diploma, English proficiency (TOEFL test min
score 540)

Address.college_name: Comenius University in Bratislava

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1919, the oldest university in the Slovak Republic. Follows the traditions of Academia Istropolitana, established 1467, renamed The Slovak University 1939, and acquired present title 1954
AdmissionRequirements: High school graduation certificate

Address.college_name: Constantine the Philosopher University in Nitra

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1959 as Nitra Pedagogical Institute to train teachers for both Slovak and Hungarian schools. Later became Faculty of Education. Acquired present status 1992 and title 1996
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčenie) and entrance examination in some subjects

Address.college_name: Danubius University

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2005 as Vysoká škola v Sládkovicove (University of Sládkovičovo). Acquired present title 2012

Address.college_name: DTI University

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2006 as Dubnica Institute of Technology in Dubnica nad Váhom. Acquired current title 2016.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary School Leaving Cerftificate

Address.college_name: Ján Albrecht Academy of Music and Arts - Banská Štiavnica
Address.university_name: Hudobná a umelecká akadémia Jána Albrechta - Banská Štiavnica (HUAJA)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2011

Address.college_name: János Selye University in Komárno

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2003

Address.college_name: Matej Bel University in Banská Bystrica
Address.university_name: Univerzita Mateja Bela v Banskej Bystrici (UMB)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1992 incorporating the Pedagogical Faculty and the School of Economics, reorganized as Higher Pedagogical School 1954, Pedagogical Faculty 1964, Branch of the Faculty of Commerce of the School of Economics in Bratislava 1973, Faculty of the Economics of Services and Tourism 1977
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedcinie), and entrance examinations

Address.college_name: Pan-European University

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2004 as Bratislavská vysoká škola Práva (Bratislava School of Law). Acquired present title 2010

Address.college_name: Pavel Jozef Šafárik University in Košice
Address.university_name: Univerzita Pavla Jozefa Šafárika v Košiciach (UPJŠ)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1959, from the Faculty of Medicine in Košice (established in 1948 as part of Komenius University, Bratislava) and of Faculty of Arts in Prešov, replacing Universitas Cassoviensis founded 1657. Closed during World War I. Faculties in Prešov established as separate University 1997
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčenie) or recognized foreign equivalent, and entrance examination

Address.college_name: School of Economics and Management of Public Administration in Bratislava
Address.university_name: Vysoká škola ekonómie a manažmentu verejnej správy v Bratislave (VŠEMVS)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2003
AdmissionRequirements: High School Certificate

Address.college_name: Slovak Medical University

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1953, acquired present status and title 2002

Address.college_name: Slovak University of Agriculture in Nitra

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1941 as part of the Technical University of Bratislava, reorganized 1952 as University of Agriculture in Nitra, and acquired present status and title 1996
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčenie) and entrance examination

Address.college_name: Slovak University of Technology in Bratislava

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1938 at Košice, moved to Martin and to Bratislava 1939. Acquired present status 1991
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčenie) and entrance examination

Address.college_name: St. Elisabeth University of Health Care and Social Work
Address.university_name: Vysoká škola zdravotníctva a sociálnej práce Sv. Alžbety

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2003

Divisions.College: Prenatal and Perinatal Psychology, Medicine and Social Sciences

Address.college_name: Technical University in Zvolen

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1770 as Academy of Mining and Forestry in Banska Stiavnica, relocated in Zwolen 1846, reorganized in 1952 as University of Forestry and Wood Technology (VSLD) in Zvolen, and acquired present status and title in 1991
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčenie) and entrance examination

Address.college_name: Technical University of Košice

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1952. Acquired present status and title 1991
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčenie) and entrance examination

Divisions.College: Mining, Ecology, Process Control and Geotechnology

Address.college_name: The Catholic University in Ružomberok
Address.university_name: Katolícka univerzita v Ružomberku – Universitas Catholica in Ružomberok (KU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2000 by transformation of St Andrew's Catechetical and Pedagogical Faculty Ružomberok by the Bishop's Conference of Slovakia and the National Council of Slovak Republic. Acquired present status 2002
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school leaving certificate and entrance examination

Address.college_name: University of Central Europe in Skalica

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2005

Address.college_name: University of Economics in Bratislava

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1940 as private Institute of Commerce, acquired present status and denomination in 1992
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčenie) and entrance examination

Address.college_name: University of Prešov in Prešov

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1997, former branch of 'Pavol Jozef Šafárik' University in Košice
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčenie) and entrance examination

Address.university_name: Vysoká škola bezpečnostného manažérstva v Košiciach

Address.university_name: Univerzita sv. Cyrila a Metoda v Trnave (UCM)

AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčenie), and entrance examinations

Address.college_name: University of Trnava in Trnave

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1992, acquired present status and title 1997
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčenie) and entrance examination

Address.college_name: University of Veterinary Medicine and Pharmacy in Košice
Address.university_name: Univerzita veterinárskeho lekárstva a farmácie v Košiciach

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1949, became Veterinary Faculty, branch of the newly established Agricultural University, Nitra 1952. Acquired status as an independent public institution 1969. Acquired present status 1991 and title 2010
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčenie) and entrance examination

Divisions.College: Animal Nutrition, Dietetics and Animal Husbandry

Address.college_name: University of Zilina

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1953 as the Faculty of Railway Engineering of the Czech Technical University Prague. Detached and re-established 1959 as the University of Transport, a separate Institution and moved to Žilina 1960. Acquired present status and name 1996
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (maturitné vysvedčinie) and entrance examinations

Divisions.College: Operation and Economics of Transport and Communications
